user_query: I am planning a surprise anniversary party for my parents and I need to check the credit score of the venue I have in mind. Can you provide me with the credit score of 'Romantic Garden' located in Los Angeles? Additionally, I would like to know the spot price of bitcoin to plan the budget for the party.

TaskList.description: Check the credit score of the venue 'Romantic Garden' located in Los Angeles.
Retrieve the current spot price of bitcoin for budgeting purposes.
